SEARCH
Package my_package

Class PetManager

java.lang.Object
my_package.PetManager
public class PetManager extends Object
Manages a collection of virtual pets, handling their storage, retrieval, and manipulation. Uses Jackson ObjectMapper for JSON serialization and deserialization of pet data.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    PetManager()
    Constructs a new PetManager and initializes the pets collection.

  • Constructor Details

    • PetManager

      public PetManager()
      Constructs a new PetManager and initializes the pets collection. Creates an ObjectMapper instance and loads existing pets from JSON file.

  • Method Details

    • getIndexbyName

      public Pet getIndexbyName(String name)
      Retrieves a pet by its name from the collection.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the pet to find
      Returns:
      The pet with the matching name
      Throws:
      Exception - if no pet with the given name exists

    • getPetbyIndex

      public Pet getPetbyIndex(int index)

    • addPet

      public void addPet(Pet pet, int index)
      Adds a new pet to the first available empty slot in the collection.
      Parameters:
      pet - The pet to add to the collection

    • removePet

      public void removePet(Pet pet, int index)
      Removes a pet from the collection and shifts remaining pets to maintain array organization. Pets are shifted forward in the array to fill any gaps created by removal.
      Parameters:
      pet - The pet to remove from the collection

    • savePets

      public void savePets()
